cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 385 miles SE of Wilmington, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the North Carolina/South Carolina coast, then expected to stall and drift slowly west–southwest across the Carolinas before turning north inland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Wilmington, North Carolina (Cape Fear area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: A Hurricane Watch is posted from Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC; Tropical Storm Watch extends north of NC/VA border to Cape Charles Light VA and Chesapeake Bay south of New Point Comfort.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from South Santee River SC to Duck NC, including Albemarle & Pamlico Sounds; Storm-Surge Warning from South Santee River SC to Duck NC including Neuse & Pamlico Rivers.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impact expected along the coasts of South Carolina, North Carolina and southeastern Virginia.
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤6%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; any gusts more likely to remain below gale force.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for New York Harbor; any surge confined to Carolinas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Potential 2–4 inches of remnant rainfall early next week, but widespread >4 inches currently not anticipated at the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and dangerous rip currents along area beaches through the weekend.
